desc: Fast relief for aches and pain, all natural spray on. Works fast and smells great. Use for Sprains, Strains, Arthritic pain, Joint pain, Back pain and Degenerative pain. Topical analgesics, safe and fast acting treatment for pain relief. Get the maximum benefit from icing, no guess work spray-on relief.

layout.text: A Better Way To Manage Pain
Not Only Does It Work, It Smells Good Too!
